page.title: 12HOUSING
page.content:
In the area there are 196 houses or bungalows including 7 farms and 10 flats.The flats and 24 houses are council owned, 40% of which are in Whatcote.
Brick houses comprise 63% with the remainder Hornton brown/grey stone or white blue Lyas stone.Oxhill has two thatched roof houses,Idlicote one. Whatcote has seven barn conversions and Oxhill three.
All of these homes have 1 or 2 living rooms,a kitchen,1 or 2 bathrooms and 2,3 or 4 bedrooms.Many of the farmhouses are larger and each village has a much larger "Gentlemans Residence" such as Idlicote house.
Up to 60% of the housing was built or converted in the last 40 years.
